Lethal Company - Scary Hey Voice Explained. Deal with Little Girl

In Lethal Company you will encounter Little Girl. From here you will learn how to deal with her. You will also find information about scary “Hey” sound.

Lethal Company is popular co-op horror. In this game you take on the role of a Company employee who collects scrap metal from abandoned industrial planets. During exploration you will encounter various opponents. One of them is the Little Girl. She is a spirit who can haunt you with a scary “Hey” sound. In this guide you will learn how to deal with her.

How to deal with the Little Girl in Lethal Company

The Little Girl is a unique opponent with very specific hunt mechanics. It’s a ghost of a girl in a red dress who haunts one particular team member. The level of fear determines who becomes her victim. This factor depends on:

character's Insanity Level;

previously sustained critical damage (less than 20 HP);

number of character's turns.

Once the girl chooses her victim, the first stage of the haunting will begin. During its time, you will experience the following phenomena:

you will hear giggling, breathing or even voices. She can say simply “Hey”;

a distorted sound that causes communication problems;

flickering light.

After a few minutes, she will enter the second phase of the haunting. She will begin to approach the victim. You will die as soon as it touches you. So, the best way to avoid death is to go back to the ship, during the first phase of the haunt.
